dataCaveatText: Note: the biggest state is #biggestState# and the smallest is #smallestState#. data depicted in this dashboard are blah blah data depicted in this dashboard are blah blah data depicted in this dashboard are blah blah data depicted in this dashboard are blah blah data depicted in this dashboard are blah blah

biggestState.query: SELECT {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} ON ROWS, NON EMPTY HEAD(ORDER({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, [Measures].[Units Ordered], DESC)) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

smallestState.query: SELECT {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} ON ROWS, NON EMPTY TAIL(ORDER({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, [Measures].[Units Ordered], DESC)) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

filterDimensions.query: WITH MEMBER Measures.Nul as Null SELECT {[Measures].[Nul]}*{[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]
filterDimensions.label: State

viz-1-1.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, {})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-2.panelTitle: Bar: Units Ordered by state excluding Oregon
viz-1-2.headerText: Units Ordered by state (bar chart), excluding Oregon
viz-1-2.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, {[Store].[Stores].[Store State].[OR]})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-3.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, {})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-4.panelTitle: Pie: Units Ordered by state for filtering
viz-1-4.headerText: Units Ordered by state (pie chart), to test filtering
viz-1-4.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * {#[Store].[Stores].[Store State]#} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-5.panelTitle: Bar: Units Ordered by state for filtering
viz-1-5.headerText: Units Ordered by state (bar chart), for testing filtering
viz-1-5.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * {#[Store].[Stores].[Store State]#} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-6.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Stores].[Store State].Members}, {})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-2-8.headerText: Line chart 1 measure w Y dimension
